archetype_name: Family Heat Lovers: Korean & Latin American Feasts (Hot, 30–60, Advanced)
name: Korean BBQ Picanha Fajita Wraps with Quick Cabbage Pickles and Spicy Black Beans
description: Char-grilled picanha in a gochujang–soy lime marinade, sliced fajita-style with peppers and onions, quick-pickled cabbage and red onion, and chipotle-black beans, all wrapped in warm tortillas.
prep_steps: In a bowl, whisk gochujang, soy sauce, lime juice, garlic, brown sugar, and sesame oil.
Pat dry picanha steak and coat with the marinade; set aside 15–30 minutes.
Thinly slice cabbage and red onion for pickles.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, salt, and water in a separate bowl; add cabbage and red onion and toss. Set aside.
Slice bell peppers and onions into 1 cm strips for fajitas.
Preheat outdoor grill to high heat and place a stovetop skillet over medium-high heat.
cook_steps: Start pickles: Toss cabbage and red onion again and press down so they’re submerged; leave at room temp while cooking.

Grill steak: Oil grill grates lightly with canola oil. Sear picanha 3–4 minutes per side for medium-rare (thicker pieces may need an extra minute per side). Move to a cooler spot if flaring. Rest 10 minutes, tented.

Fajita veg: In the hot skillet, add canola oil, then bell peppers and onions. Season with salt, black pepper, ground cumin, and chilli flakes. Sauté 6–8 minutes until tender-crisp with charred edges. Keep warm.
Spicy beans: In a saucepan, combine black beans, chipotle sauce, a splash of water, and a pinch of salt. Simmer 5–7 minutes, stirring, until saucy.
Warm tortillas: Place tortilla wraps on the grill 10–15 seconds per side until pliable; stack and wrap in a clean towel.
Slice steak: Cut picanha against the grain into thin slices. Toss with any resting juices.
Assemble: Lay out tortillas. Add fajita peppers/onions, steak slices, a spoon of quick pickles (drained), spicy black beans, and coriander.
Serve immediately with extra pickles and beans on the side.

ingredients.preparation: for pickles; plus splashes as needed
divided; for grill grates and sautéing
